2.   c         larger temperature implies larger (average) speed/larger (average) KE of        Ignore any mention of PV=nRT
               molecules/particles/atoms âœ”

               increased force/momentum transferred to walls (per collision) / more frequent
               collisions with walls âœ”                                                                                               3

               increased force leads to increased pressure because P=F/A (as area remains
               constant) âœ”

5.   c   i    the magnetic force does not do work on the electron hence does not change the
              electronâ€™s kinetic energy
              OR                                                                                                                        1

              the magnetic force/acceleration is at right angles to velocity âœ”

              (therefore) there is a centripetal acceleration / force acting on the charge âœ”   OWTTE                                    2

 7.    e          step-up transformers increase voltage/step-down transformers decrease voltage âœ”
                  (step-up transformers increase voltage) from plants to transmission lines / (step-
                  down transformers decrease voltage) from transmission lines to final utilizers âœ”
                                                                                                                                              3 max
                  this decreases current (in transmission lines) âœ”
                  to minimize energy/power losses in transmission âœ”
